name: dire-hit-2
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's critical hit rate by two stages.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
short_effect: Raises critical hit rate by two stages in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.
